key_points: Create a FastAPI application with a serverless handler
Run and test the FastAPI application
Explore logs for serverless handler invocations

code_examples.code:
from fastapi import FastAPI, HTTPException
app = FastAPI()
def my_handler(event, context): ...
@app.post('/my-endpoint')
def my_route(): ...

version_notes: This guide focuses on FastAPI version 0.70+, which is compatible with Python 3.12+
